meanings.definition: The quality or state of being like a pig.
meanings.sent1: Her pigginesses showed when she ate all the cookies.
meanings.sent2: The farm was full of pigginesses, with mud everywhere.
meanings.sent3: His pigginesses came out when he snorted at the buffet.
meanings.sent4: The pigginesses of the room made it feel cozy and warm.
meanings.sent5: The pigginesses of the child's room made it feel like a barn.

meanings.definition: The behavior or characteristics of a pig.
meanings.sent1: The pigginesses of the piglet made everyone smile.
meanings.sent2: She observed the pigginesses of the pigs rolling in the mud.
meanings.sent3: The pigginesses of the pig's oink was surprisingly cute.
meanings.sent4: His room was a mess, showing his pigginesses in full display.
meanings.sent5: The pigginesses of the farm animals made the children giggle.

meanings.definition: The greed or selfishness associated with pigs.
meanings.sent1: Her pigginesses showed when she refused to share her toys.
meanings.sent2: The businessman's pigginesses were evident in his unfair deals.
meanings.sent3: The pigginesses of the siblings fighting over the last piece of cake was comical.
meanings.sent4: The pigginesses of the corporation led to the downfall of many small businesses.
meanings.sent5: The pigginesses of the character in the story made him unlikeable.
